security: Releasing information about individuals, even if the document is unclassified, could reveal personal details and compromise privacy.  The document contains a Social Security number, which is considered PII (Personally Identifiable Information).
summary: This document is a local agency check report on David Reed Fromer, dated December 16, 1966, indicating no record found in the files of a Casual Source in Berkeley, California.
summary_one_paragraph: On January 20, 1998, a document was released with deletions under the John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act. The document is an agent report from INSCOM/CSF, dated December 16, 1966, concerning David Reed Fromer. A local agency check conducted on December 15, 1966, by Eric E. McKnight of the 115th MI Gp (I), revealed no record of Fromer in the files of a Casual Source in Berkeley, California.
title: Local Agency Check on David Reed Fromer
